HumanQuery: count the states which have elevations lower than what alabama has
SQLQuery: select count(highlow.state_name) from highlow where highlow.lowest_elevation <(select highlow.lowest_elevation from highlow where highlow.state_name='alabama');

HumanQuery: give me the number of rivers in california
SQLQuery: select count(river.river_name) from river where river.traverse='california';

HumanQuery: give me the states that border utah
SQLQuery: select border_info.border from border_info where border_info.state_name='utah';
select highlow.highest_elevation from highlow where highlow.highest_point='mount mckinley';

HumanQuery: how high is the highest point in america
how high is the highest point of alabama
SQLQuery: select highlow.highest_elevation from highlow where highlow.state_name='alabama';
select state.area from state where state.state_name='alaska';
select state.area from state where state.state_name='texas';

HumanQuery: how long is the colorado river
SQLQuery: select river.length from river where river.river_name='colorado';

HumanQuery: how long is the delaware river
SQLQuery: select river.length from river where river.river_name='delaware';

HumanQuery: how long is the longest river in california
SQLQuery: select river.length from river where river.traverse='california' and river.length=(select max(river.length) from river where river.traverse='california');

HumanQuery: how long is the longest river in the usa
SQLQuery: select river.length from river where river.length=(select max(river.length) from river);

HumanQuery: how long is the north platte river
SQLQuery: select river.length from river where river.river_name='north platte';

HumanQuery: how long is the ohio river
SQLQuery: select river.length from river where river.river_name='ohio';

HumanQuery: how many capitals does rhode island have
SQLQuery: select count(state.capital) from state where state.state_name='rhode island';

HumanQuery: how many cities are there in the united states
how many citizens does the biggest city have in the usa
SQLQuery: select city.population from city where city.population=(select max(city.population) from city);

HumanQuery: how many colorado rivers are there
SQLQuery: select count(river.river_name) from river where river.river_name='colorado';

HumanQuery: how many people lived in austin
SQLQuery: select city.population from city where city.city_name='austin';
